attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Disgusted over the proposition of a 2 tier Health Service which will enable people who can`t afford to buy certain drugs will die sooner,while those who can will have the benefit of all that the health service can provide

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
